tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE hotel_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  month_year VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  revenue DECIMAL(10, 2),
  expenses DECIMAL(10, 2),
  occupancy_rate DECIMAL(5, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE revenue_reports (
    report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    month_date DATE NOT NULL,
    total_revenue DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    room_revenue DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    restaurant_revenue DECIMAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE expense_reports (
    report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    month_date DATE NOT NULL,
    total_expenses DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    labor_expenses DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    supplies_expenses DECIMAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE reservations (
    reservation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    guest_name VARCHAR(100),
    check_in_date DATE,
    check_out_date DATE,
    room_id INT
);
